title: Exploding Kittens & Codenames Night
description: Join us for a thrilling evening of Exploding Kittens and Codenames. Enjoy snacks and laughter as we dive into these exciting and hilarious games.

title: Catan Strategy Showdown
description: Compete in a high-stakes Catan tournament and test your resource management and negotiation skills. The winner will take home a special grand prize!

title: Pandemic: Save the World Night
description: Join us for a cooperative evening as we team up to save the world in the classic board game Pandemic. Work together, strategize, and see if you can prevent global outbreaks.

title: Ticket to Ride & Sushi Go Night
description: Embark on a cross-country adventure with Ticket to Ride and enjoy a quick game of Sushi Go between rounds. An evening filled with strategy and fun.

title: Dominion Deck-Building Duel
description: Test your deck-building skills in a competitive Dominion tournament. Strategize, build your deck, and outmaneuver your opponents to claim victory!
